"Suffren": "I'm Suffren. I came here with the Kvaris vanguard."
"You folks came here to look for Ilma, I hear."
"I can't help but worry for him either."
"This might sound outta left field coming from me, but please help those kids out however you can."
"I'm counting on you."
"I heard you found Ilma safe and sound. I also heard that stuff about Lost Central."
"Including the message that Rysas left behind. It's almost like he knew about his impending death..."
"Listen, I've got a favor to ask. Do you think you'd be able to revisit Lost Central for me?"
"It's possible Rysas could've left something else behind."
"I'm counting on you to carry out a search of Lost Central."
"I see. I thought you'd be the one I could ask..."
"Well, if you ever feel like it, come back and talk to me."
"You've returned. Thanks."
"So you couldn't find any other clues on Rysas, huh..."
"In those days, Rysas' strength towered above all of the other ARKS."
"Enough to match the leaders of every region."
"Though after he grew old, you could see that he'd become only slightly weaker."
"What I mean to say is, he wasn't someone who was going to die easily."
"Honestly, I even think he's still alive."
"I know. You couldn't find any clues on Rysas, but..."
"Could you do me another favor?"
"There's something I want you to find."
"I see... Understood. If you ever feel like it, come back and talk to me."
"I want to make an offering to that grave."
"Could you bring me some Refreshing Kvar Plums?"
"Hey, you're back. Do you have those Plums for me?"
"Hand over 5 Refreshing Kvar Plums"
"Cancel"
"Nice. Thanks, really. I'll be sure to offer these with care."
"Hey, let me just say this again..."
"Thank you, for finding Ilma."
"This might sound weird, but I see a bit of my younger self in you."
"You accomplished the same sort of goal that I wasn't able to."
"...That's how I see you."
"You know how I said someone was injured during our search for Rysas?"
"Yeah, well... That person was me."
"And the person who suggested we call off the search... was Taivas."
"I don't think they could stand the idea that someone got injured because of their family."
"Ever since then, those kids have kind of just kept to themselves."
"All this time, it's felt like I'm the reason we weren't able to find Rysas."
"And then you came along, and managed to form a bond with them."
"I saw that as kind of a sign."
"A sign to try to confront these feelings of guilt and regret once more."
"From here on, I won't be looking back. I'm going to start looking for Rysas again."
"When I see an opportunity, I think I'm going to try heading out toward Lost Central."
"And hey, if you ever end up finding something, no matter how insignificant, I want you to tell me about it."
"Cheers."
"Oh? I think we should offer a bit more than this. Sorry, could you go get a few more?"
"Ah, alright... Well, when you're done gathering them, let me know."
"From here on, I won't be looking back. I'm going to start looking for Rysas again."
"And hey, if you ever end up finding something, no matter how insignificant, I want you to tell me about it."
